body:
Comment 8: 
major 386 downloads
(https://code.google.com/p/go/downloads/list?can=2&q=&sort=-downloadcount)
are all for the windows-386 version.
i guess we should do something here.

first of all, could we make the msi installer refuse to continue when sse2 is not
detected?
(of course, it should display a message pointing to community provided GO386=387
installers)

i'm not sure how to deal with the zip file.
